original_title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: A Valentine Surprise For Minnie
overview: Share the sweetest day of the year with your Clubhouse pals and help Mickey create A Valentine Surprise For Minnie! Mickey wants to give Minnie a gift from the heart: a pink, sparkly Valentine. But can he finish making the card and get to Mickey Park in time to deliver it before sundown? With your help - and the right mouseketools - Mickey can make Minnie's Valentine's Day wishes come true!
title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: A Valentine Surprise For Minnie
